alternate_methods:
##Book by phone

You can book your theory test by calling the Driving Standards Agency (DSA). If you don't have an email address, your confirmation will be sent in the post. 

$C

**DSA theory test bookings**  

**Telephone:** 0300 200 1122 (English), 0300 200 1133 (Welsh)  
**Textphone:** 0300 200 1166  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm

$C

##Book by post

To book your theory test by post download the application form and send it with your payment to the DSA.

You can pay by cheque or postal order - make your cheque or postal order payable to the 'Driving Standards Agency'. You can't pay by cash.

$D [Download ‘Postal application for a driving theory test’ form (PDF, 356KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_4015378.pdf "Download ‘Postal application for a driving theory test’ form (PDF, 356KB)"){:rel="external"} $D

$A

DSA
PO Box 381
Manchester
M50 3UW

$A

##Data protection

You can read the [Data Protection Act 1998 - Fair Processing Notice for the DSA](/dsa-theory-test-booking-service-data-protection "Data Protection Act 1998 - Fair Processing Notice for the DSA") before you start your booking.

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency
alternative_title: Book your official Driving Standards Agency (DSA) theory test
introduction: Book your official driving theory test - you'll need your provisional driving licence.
more_information:
You’ll need your:

- Great Britain or Northern Ireland provisional driving licence number
- email address to get your booking confirmation - you can't book online if you don't have one

% You have to wait at least 3 clear working days before taking your test again if you don't pass. %
overview: Book your theory test from £31 using this official theory test booking service
title: Book your driving theory test
